data.name: Being Left The F*** Alone Simulator
data.detailed_description:
BLTFA Sim is a mindfulness and self-care game in the style of a 90's era adventure game.

Non-violent, non-stressful and a little tongue-in-cheek, this game is a response to the intensity of modern living and the commodification of our attention. It is designed as a peaceful and healing "time out" from the world with a focus on simply looking after yourself.

The relaxing gameplay is complemented by a beautifully serene soundtrack by The Aurora Principle.
